content: --दर्शन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ना|नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {1} good-looking, beautiful, handsome. {2} easily seen. (--नः the discus of Viṣṇu; as in कृष्णोप्यसुदर्शनः <ls>K.</ls> {2} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {3} of mount Meru. {4} a vulture. (--नी --नं <ab>N.</ab> of Amarāvatī, Indra's capital. (--नं <ab>N.</ab> of Jambudvīpa.
